decodeAmountIn(bytes,bool).details: decodes the txData and returns the amount of input token on source

params.genericSwapDisallowed_: true if generic swaps are disallowed
params.txData_: is the txData of the cross chain deposit

decodeDstSwap(bytes).details: decodes neccesary information for processing swaps on the destination chain

params.txData_: is the txData to be decoded

returns.token_: is the address of the token

decodeSwapOutputToken(bytes).details: decodes the final output token address (for only direct chain actions!)

params.txData_: is the txData to be decoded

validateReceiver(bytes,address).details: validates the receiver of the liquidity request

params.receiver_: is the address of the receiver to validate
params.txData_: is the txData of the cross chain deposit

validateTxData((bytes,uint64,uint64,uint.details: validates the txData of a cross chain deposit

params.args_: the txData arguments to validate in txData

returns.hasDstSwap: if the txData contains a destination swap
